attributes.additional_details: PLEASE SIGN TO HELP US SAVE OUR GREYHOUND STADIUM IN OXFORD.THEY ARE PLANNING TO CLOSE IT ON THE 29TH DECEMBER 2012, WE NEED TO GET 100K SIGNATURES BEFORE THE GOVERMENT WILL CONSIDER LOOKING AT IT AND WE HAVEN'T GOT MUCH TIME AS THIS HAS JUST BEEN ANNOUNCED SO ACT FAST AND HELP US SAVE OUR FACILITIES IN OUR COMMUNITY. WE WAN'T THE GOVERMENT TO PUT A STOP ON THIS CLOSURE, AND SAVE THE STAFF THERE JOBS AND TO STOP HUNDREDS OF GREYHOUNDS THAT MIGHT HAVE TO BE PUT DOWN

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
